channel.title: Merlin Mann on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Merlin Mann on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: creativity vs productivity
item.description: Merlin Mann has relaunched 43 Folders; he doesn't want to be the productivity guy any more, he wants to be the creativity guy.  It's a good choice. He notes some essential tension between the demand of professional bloggers to produce immense quantities of on-topic dreck that generates a lot of page views, vs the wise craft of intense creative types who sweat the details to edit things down to a fine polish.
